item.title: SEO For Sales: Making The Pitch
item.description: My days as a freewheeling, unrestrained, happy-go-lucky, gung-ho city cowboy are over. As of 31 August 2013, I’m a married man, and for the rest of my life, I will dedicate myself to optimizing my relationship to my beautiful wife. The old ball-and-chain. But before I bury myself in the bosom of our bless√®d alliance, I’ll continue to blog about the dark and murky undergrowth of digital marketing that SEO is.
